game.name: Campsite Hustle! - Management Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build your own outdoor store and campground in the heart of Red Shore Valley. Set up your shelves, manage your stock, expand your campsite, and take care of every guest. From humble beginnings to a thriving business all in the middle of nature!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your own outdoor store and campground in the heart of Red Shore Valley. Set up your shelves, manage your stock, expand your campsite, and take care of every guest. From humble beginnings to a thriving business all in the middle of nature!
